diagrams.mermaidDefinition:
graph TD
  subgraph Service_["Service"]
    SampleComponent["SampleComponent"]
    ApiService["ApiService"]
  end
  subgraph UI_["UI"]
    SettingsComponent["SettingsComponent"]
    DashboardComponent["DashboardComponent"]
    ImporterComponent["ImporterComponent"]
  end
  subgraph Data_["Data"]
    DatabaseService["DatabaseService"]
  end
  ApiService --> DatabaseService
  ApiService --> SampleComponent
  DashboardComponent --> ApiService
  ImporterComponent --> SampleComponent
  SettingsComponent --> ApiService
  style SampleComponent fill:#cccccc
  style SettingsComponent fill:#ff6699
  style ApiService fill:#ffcc00
  style DashboardComponent fill:#99ccff
  style DatabaseService fill:#66cc99
  style ImporterComponent fill:#ff9966

nodes.name: SampleComponent
nodes.description: A sample component for testing the generator.

nodes.name: SettingsComponent
nodes.description: A settings panel for configuring user preferences.

nodes.name: ApiService
nodes.description: An API service that coordinates between components and database.

nodes.name: DashboardComponent
nodes.description: A dashboard component that displays user data.

nodes.name: DatabaseService
nodes.description: A database service that stores user data.

nodes.name: ImporterComponent
nodes.description: An importer component that depends on SampleComponent.
